message.content:
cs.CL, cs.SI, cs.IR, cs.SD, cs.CY 

This paper deals with predicting controversiality of posts based on textual content and discussion features. This falls under the domain of natural language processing (NLP) and social media analysis, which are covered under cs.CL (Computation and Language) and cs.SI (Social and Information Networks). The use of machine learning algorithms for prediction also falls under cs.IR (Information Retrieval) and cs.SD (Sound and Music Computing). Finally, the study of online communities and their behavior falls under cs.CY (Computers and Society).
